extendedInfo.description: Discover the world of apps, music, and books in a unique way:  by letting SCOUT do the work for you.  SCOUT is easy to use.  Answer a few fun questions the first time you use the app so that SCOUT can figure out who you are.  Youâll see a list of personalized app, music, and book recommendations selected just for you.  Every time you âthumbs upâ or âthumbs downâ recommendations, your list gets even better and youâll find that SCOUT is finding items that you never would have found on your own.  If you see something you like and want to see more items like it, just click on âshow moreâ.   Looking for a particular artist or author?  Click on the search tab and type in what youâre looking for or click on a genre or category.  All of your music and books are available for download through amazon.com.  Youâll need to have the Amazon MP3 player  app installed to download your MP3s and the Amazon Kindle app to download books.  While youâre using SCOUT, youâll encounter C Spire Experts.  Critics and Star Users write reviews for apps, music, and books and they will give you suggestions for other things that you might like.  If you find a Star User that you like, click âfollowâ so that you can find out what apps, books, and music heâs downloading and read his reviews as soon as theyâre available.

reviews.title: Freezes up!
reviews.comment: I just installed this app but it just freezes up an I can\'t do anything. So is this the app where you can pay your bill and such?? Fix and I\'ll give it 5 Stars! Thanks!  :)

reviews.comment: Force closes a lot
reviews.author: Dustin Alexander

reviews.title: Seriously?
reviews.comment: Ads, really? To C Spire Customers: To easily earn Perc Points with minimal effort, rate and re-rate the same application over and over again. C Spire does not keep track of how many times you rate an application and will award you Percent Points for every app rating regardless of whether or not you have previously rated the application. They do however limit app rating Perc Points to 500 per month. Enjoy. To C Spire: Have fun fixing this, hope the ad revenue is worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Total crap
reviews.comment: A waste of space. And it crashes my phone even tho I have never used it. The total crap this company churns out is just as bad as their lies and misconceptions about their \"unlimited\" plans.
reviews.author: Johnathan Seymour

reviews.title: Thanks...
reviews.comment: Pointless to even waste space on my phone. Much less always be trying to update
reviews.author: Brett G

reviews.title: Does NOT Work....
reviews.comment: I have installed, reinstalled, emailed, etc for over 6 months. The app does not work. I can sign in and it automatically closes. No help whatsoever from anyone. It was nice to have to check percs points fast. Now I just go to CSpire website. So 1star (only because I could nit post with a no star rating), waste of time, especially since issues have not been resolved by email or instore inquisitions. Thanks (Motorola x2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I cannot open it. I cannot unstill it. Great concept but no way to use it. Major downfall is the cap of possible percs points one could earn per month.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: It will not open! I have typed everything to sign in at least 15 times & it will just not open! I QUIT! 1 star is too much..
